Package ch.emf.Thymio_Java_Connnect.services

Class ServiceThymioCommunicator

java.lang.Object
org.java_websocket.WebSocketAdapter
org.java_websocket.AbstractWebSocket
org.java_websocket.client.WebSocketClient
ch.emf.Thymio_Java_Connnect.services.ServiceThymioCommunicator
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable, org.java_websocket.WebSocket, org.java_websocket.WebSocketListener
public class ServiceThymioCommunicator extends org.java_websocket.client.WebSocketClient
Thymio service for Thymio Java Connect. This service is used to receive messages from the Thymio.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Tom Yerly
